name: F.C.R.E
description:
Description

F.C.R.E is a relaxing where the player shoots liquid candy from a magical bottle to feed the cute animals. Have fun after a stressful day and feed a variety of cute and lovely animals.

 

Key Features

·         Cute pixel art

·         Three different animals to feed

·         Relieves stress

·         Easy to get started

 

Release Information

Available for FREE now!

Exclusively on itch.io for PC only

Released as of 30th January, 2020

 

Contact Info

Email: zilingwangjxx@gmail.com

 

Personal Bio

My name is Ziling Wang. Most of people love cute animals, but they can not have one.
